name: Sing Your Heart Out
title: Sing Your Heart Out
desc: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. Said to be the Flower-Feather Clan's secret weapon for soothing their throats and protecting their vocal cords â€” so eat one and go sing your heart out! Just make sure you don't go overboard, as too much sugar can leave your throat feeling hoarse.

skills.desc:
All of your characters gain Satiated. Draw 3 cards and use 1 fewer Elemental Die for the next 2 character switches.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
